document.full_text: ryan kesler scored his second power-play goal at 10:45 of overtime, and the vancouver canucks beat the nashville predators and grabbed a 2-1 series lead.
document.title: canucks 3, predators 2 (ot): kesler's overtime goal puts canucks up 2-1 on nashville
lines_and_colors: ryan kesler scored his second power-play goal at 10:45 of overtime, and the vancouver canucks beat the nashville predators and grabbed a 2-1 series lead.
